register.name: tag
register.description: [0x000-0x003] Tag: fixed value 0x62666366, ascii: 'fcfb'

register.name: reserved0
register.description: [0x008-0x00b] Reserved for future use

register.name: readSampleClkSrc
register.description: [0x00c-0x00c] Read Sample Clock Source, valid value: 0/1/3

register.name: csHoldTime
register.description: [0x00d-0x00d] CS hold time, default value: 3

register.name: csSetupTime
register.description: [0x00e-0x00e] CS setup time, default value: 3

register.name: columnAddressWidth
register.description: [0x00f-0x00f] Column Address width, for HyperBus protocol, it is fixed to 3, For Serial NAND, need to refer to datasheet

register.name: deviceModeCfgEnable
register.description: [0x010-0x010] Device Mode Configuration Enable feature: 1 - Enabled, 0 - Disabled

register.name: deviceModeType
register.description: [0x011-0x011] Specify the configuration command type: Quad Enable, DPI/QPI/OPI switch, Generic configuration, etc.

register.name: waitTimeCfgCommands
register.description: [0x012-0x013] Wait time for all configuration commands, unit: 100us, Used for DPI/QPI/OPI switch or reset command

register.name: deviceModeSeq
register.description: [0x014-0x017] Device mode sequence info, [7:0] - LUT number of sequences, [15:8] - LUT sequence index, [31:16] Reserved

register.name: deviceModeArg
register.description: [0x018-0x01b] Argument/Parameter for device configuration

register.name: configCmdEnable
register.description: [0x01c-0x01c] Config Command Enable feature: 1 - Enable, 0 - Disable

register.name: configModeType_0
register.description: [0x01d-0x01f] Configure Mode Type, similar as deviceModeType, configModeType for configCmdSeq[0]

register.name: configModeType_1
register.description: [0x01d-0x01f] Configure Mode Type, similar as deviceModeType, configModeType for configCmdSeq[1]

register.name: configModeType_2
register.description: [0x01d-0x01f] Configure Mode Type, similar as deviceModeType, configModeType for configCmdSeq[2]

register.name: configCmdSeqs_0
register.description: [0x020-0x02b] Sequence info for Device Configuration command, similar as deviceModeSeq

register.name: configCmdSeqs_1
register.description: [0x020-0x02b] Sequence info for Device Configuration command, similar as deviceModeSeq

register.name: configCmdSeqs_2
register.description: [0x020-0x02b] Sequence info for Device Configuration command, similar as deviceModeSeq

register.name: reserved1
register.description: [0x02c-0x02f] Reserved for future use

register.name: configCmdArgs_0
register.description: [0x030-0x03b] Arguments/Parameters for device Configuration commands

register.name: configCmdArgs_1
register.description: [0x030-0x03b] Arguments/Parameters for device Configuration commands

register.name: configCmdArgs_2
register.description: [0x030-0x03b] Arguments/Parameters for device Configuration commands

register.name: reserved2
register.description: [0x03c-0x03f] Reserved for future use

register.name: controllerMiscOption
register.description: [0x040-0x043] Controller Misc Option, see Misc feature bit definitions for more details

bit_field.name: bit9
bit_field.description: Bit9 - Second DQS pi mux group

register.name: deviceType
register.description: [0x044-0x044] Device Type: See Flash Type Definition for more details

register.name: sflashPadType
register.description: [0x045-0x045] Serial Flash Pad Type: 1 - Single, 2 - Dual, 4 - Quad, 8 - Octal

register.name: serialClkFreq
register.description: [0x046-0x046] Serial Flash Frequency, device specific definitions, See System Boot Chapter for more details

register.name: lutCustomSeqEnable
register.description: [0x047-0x047] LUT customization Enable, it is required if the program/erase cannot be done using 1 LUT sequence, currently, only applicable to HyperFLASH

bit_field_value.name: XMCD_FLEXSPI_RAM_LUT_CUSTOM_SEQ_DISABLED
bit_field_value.description: 0 - Use pre-defined LUT sequence index and number

bit_field_value.name: XMCD_FLEXSPI_RAM_LUT_CUSTOM_SEQ_ENABLED
bit_field_value.description: 1 - Use LUT sequence parameters provided in this block

register.name: reserved3_0
register.description: [0x048-0x04f] Reserved for future use

register.name: reserved3_1
register.description: [0x048-0x04f] Reserved for future use

register.name: sflashA1Size
register.description: [0x050-0x053] Size of Flash connected to A1

register.name: sflashA2Size
register.description: [0x054-0x057] Size of Flash connected to A2

register.name: sflashB1Size
register.description: [0x058-0x05b] Size of Flash connected to B1

register.name: sflashB2Size
register.description: [0x05c-0x05f] Size of Flash connected to B2

register.name: csPadSettingOverride
register.description: [0x060-0x063] CS pad setting override value

register.name: sclkPadSettingOverride
register.description: [0x064-0x067] SCK pad setting override value

register.name: dataPadSettingOverride
register.description: [0x068-0x06b] data pad setting override value

register.name: dqsPadSettingOverride
register.description: [0x06c-0x06f] DQS pad setting override value

register.name: timeoutInMs
register.description: [0x070-0x073] Timeout threshold for read status command

register.name: commandInterval
register.description: [0x074-0x077] CS deselect interval between two commands

register.name: dataValidTime_0
register.description: [0x078-0x07b] CLK edge to data valid time for PORT A and PORT B, in terms of 0.1ns

register.name: dataValidTime_1
register.description: [0x078-0x07b] CLK edge to data valid time for PORT A and PORT B, in terms of 0.1ns

register.name: busyOffset
register.description: [0x07c-0x07d] Busy offset, valid value: 0-31

register.name: busyBitPolarity
register.description: [0x07e-0x07f] Busy flag polarity, 0 - busy flag is 1 when flash device is busy, 1 - busy flag is 0 when flash device is busy

register.name: lookupTable_0
register.description: [0x080-0x17f] Lookup table holds Flash command sequences

register.description: [0x080-0x17f] Lookup table holds Flash command sequences

register.description: Page size of Serial NOR

register.description: Sector size of Serial NOR

register.description: Sector/Block size is the same

register.description: Half the Serial Clock for non-read command: true/false

register.name: needRestoreNoCmdMode
register.description: Need to Restore NoCmd mode after IP commmand execution
